guide.introduction: This guide will show you how make a simple 5mw laser pointer burn.
guide.introduction_rendered:
This guide will show you how make a simple 5mw laser pointer burn.

Tools
  • screw driver

lines.text: This guide  is very simple. Go to "files" on this guide. It will show you everything.
lines.text_raw: This guide  is very simple. Go to "files" on this guide. It will show you everything.

lines.text: If you followed the pdf (in "files"), try to burn a small smoke bomb or a match. If it works, success!
lines.text_raw: If you followed the pdf (in "files"), try to burn a small smoke bomb or a match. If it works, success!

guide.title: Make a 5mw laser pointer burn
